entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 9 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 9 along the coast. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
